Html:
I'm new to RAWR and cant seem to figure out why the program keeps putting MP5 in the gem slots...

Also, when I try to change them I can't find any of the gems I wish to use, IE: Runed Cardinal Ruby, Reckless Ametrine...ect...


Any help would be appreciated.

Mp5 probably provides the most DPS increase of any gem for the character you have defined. Most likely, that's because you haven't buffed it, so it's going OOM.

Also, make sure you don't have anything filtered out, in the Filters dropdown in the top right.

Assuming that you don't actually need MP5, I have seen Rawr be a little "glitchy" at times on my Elem and seem to be showing me Restoration gems (not in the optimizer -- but for the standard gemming slots). I've seen it happen 2X, but not sure how to reproduce. You could sanity check and make sure that the correct gemming templates are in place and that you have selected the appropriate gems as available for the optimizer.
